message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a range of features that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Given its quality and capabilities, I propose a price of $15000 for it. I'm confident this investment will prove to be highly beneficial for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. I believe this price is fair considering the features and quality you've described. Can you consider my offer?
